To check the corellation between care score and survey score and procedure variability and durvey score I calculated the care score similar to the one for best hospitals and procedure variability similar to hospital variability. 
I then mapped them to the survey score for the provider. 

Here is the data for top 100 providers with highest care score and corresponding survey score.

The maximum survey score is 332. As we can see from the table very few of the top 100 providers have survey score over 200. This probably means that a high care score is not directly corelated to survey score.

--------------------------------------

260020  2672.0  115

Here is the data for top 100 providers with highest variability across different procedures provided by the provider and corresponding survey score.

Ver few providers have survey score over 150 . This shows that high variability in procedure score corresponds to lower survey score, which makes sense, since the care quality for a provider is not consistent across procedures patients might have varying reviews.

provider_id, procedure_score_deviation, survey_score
-------------------------------------------------

440011  266.32993195106934      18
100154  264.2816215899321       155
